metadata.name: Golden Soul
metadata.description:
'Golden Soul'

48" x 30"

Sculpture on canvas - Kintsugi Series  
Insulation material, dense foam, acrylic, and resin on stretched canvas

Kintsugi is the Japanese/Chinese art philosophy of mending broken pottery with gold. The broken pottery ends up stronger and more unique due to the sophisticated handcrafted mending process.

Polen applies Kintsugi to human beings. We all break, yet we are free to re-create and heal ourselves unapologetically in any color or form. Imperfections are to be embraced.

Golden Soul is a broken soul turned into pure gold. She went through her metamorphosis in her own ways. Maybe you are too all your broken parts mended together and shining as a whole. 

This NFT is paired with the physical work of art by the artist Polen Cerci in Miami 2022/2023

The buyer of this NFT can redeem the physical work on https://artfora.com

attributes.value: Insulation material, dense foam, acrylic, and resin on stretched canvas
